mapper.select: SELECT BK_NO , T.TARGET_NAME AS BK_TARGET_NO , BK_WRITER , BK_TYPE , TO_CHAR(BK_START, 'YYYY/MM/DD')BK_START , TO_CHAR(START_TIME, 'HH24:MI') START_TIME , TO_CHAR(BK_END, 'YYYY/MM/DD')BK_END , TO_CHAR(END_TIME, 'HH24:MI') END_TIME , TARGET_IMAGE FROM BOOKING B JOIN TARGET T ON BK_TARGET_NO = T.TARGET_NO ORDER BY BK_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKING ( BK_NO , BK_WRITER , BK_TYPE , BK_TARGET_NO , BK_START , START_TIME , BK_END , END_TIME ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOOKING_NO.NEXTVAL , #{bkWriter} , #{bkType} , #{bkTargetNo} , TO_DATE(#{bkStart}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') , TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'HH24:MI') , TO_DATE(#{bkEnd}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') , TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'HH24:MI') )
